SEARCH
Package com.glamdring.greenZenith.externals.database

Class GZDBExecutor

java.lang.Object
com.glamdring.greenZenith.externals.database.GZDBExecutor
public class GZDBExecutor extends Object
Creates, prepares, fills and executes SQL Statements depending on the given input. Given a specific table, it can return the name of each field in the database by getTableFields(), the name of each type with their correspondant field name as key by getTableTypes(), create select, insert, update and delete statements with their respective values and conditions format, and prepare the correct data to be used on the statement.
Since:
0.1
Version:
1.3.1
See Also:
  • GZDBConnector

    Prepares a statement string value with a specified format that gets filled with the defined data input, it is next executed in the MySQL Server with every argument filled.

  • Constructor Details

    • GZDBExecutor

      public GZDBExecutor(Connection connection, PreparedStatement preparedStatement, GZDBActions action, GZDBTables table)
      Assigns each parameter to their private field equivalent for usage on executing SQL Statements.
      Parameters:
      connection - A MySQL Server connection.
      preparedStatement - The object that executes every SQL Statement.
      action - The defined action to be executed on a table.
      table - The defined table to execute actions in.

  • Method Details

    • describeTable

      private ResultSet describeTable() throws SQLException
      Executes the DESCRIBE statement in the MySQL Server with the already defined table.
      Returns:
      A SQL ResultSet containing the table's information, like field names, data types and others.
      Throws:
      SQLException - In case the table doesn't exist.

    • getTableFields

      public LinkedHashSet<String> getTableFields() throws SQLException
      Utilizes the describeTable() method to extract only the names of each field in the specified table.
      Returns:
      A set with the name of each field inside a table in the MySQL Server.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Refer to describeTable()

    • getTableTypes

      public LinkedHashMap<String,String> getTableTypes() throws SQLException
      Utilizes the describeTable() method to extract the data type of each field, including the name of the field.
      Returns:
      A map with the name of each data type inside a table in the MySQL Server, with the names of each field as keys.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Refer to describeTable()

    • getResultMapWithWhereClause

      private ArrayList<LinkedHashMap<String,Object>> getResultMapWithWhereClause(ResultSet resultSet, LinkedHashMap<String,String> typesMap) throws SQLException
      Adds each result of a SQL Select statement execution with the data type as key into an array list for easier management of multiple results. See executeSelect(LinkedHashMap<String, Object>)
      Parameters:
      resultSet - Data returned by a SQL Select statement execution.
      typesMap - A map containing the data types with the field names as keys. See getTableTypes()
      Returns:
      A list containing maps with each returning value from the result set and the field name as key.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If the ResultSet object cannot be resolved correctly.

    • setPreparedStatementArguments

      private PreparedStatement setPreparedStatementArguments(PreparedStatement preparedStatement, LinkedHashMap<String,Object> inputMap, LinkedHashMap<String,String> typesMap) throws SQLException
      Fills up a prepared statement with the a map containing the field names and data.
      Parameters:
      preparedStatement - Contains a SQL Statement with undefined values.
      inputMap - All the data that will fill the PreparedStatement object with their respective field names.
      typesMap - A map containing the data types with the field names as keys. See getTableTypes().
      Returns:
      The PreparedStatement argument filled with data in each required position.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If the PreparedStatement object cannot be resolved correctly.

    • setPreparedStatementArguments

      private PreparedStatement setPreparedStatementArguments(PreparedStatement preparedStatement, LinkedHashMap<String,Object> inputMap, LinkedHashMap<String,Object> selectMap, LinkedHashMap<String,String> typesMap) throws SQLException
      Fills up a prepared statement with the a map containing the field names and data.
      Parameters:
      preparedStatement - Contains a SQL Statement with undefined values, consisting of two segments, insertion and selection.
      inputMap - All the data that will fill the PreparedStatement object with their respective field names on the insertion segment.
      selectMap - All the data that will fill the PreparedStatement object with their respective field names on the selection segment.
      typesMap - A map containing the data types with the field names as keys. See getTableTypes()
      Returns:
      The PreparedStatement argument filled with data in each required position of both segments.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If the PreparedStatement object cannot be resolved correctly.

    • makeSelectValueClause

      private String makeSelectValueClause(LinkedHashMap<String,Object> insertMap, LinkedHashMap<String,String> typesMap)
      Creates a VALUE clause for an SQL Insert statement.
      Parameters:
      insertMap - Defines which fields will have their default values and which will be inserted.
      typesMap - A map containing the data types with the field names as keys. See getTableTypes()
      Returns:
      A VALUE clause in a string format to be appended into a full SQL Insert Statement.

    • getInsertStatement

      private String getInsertStatement(LinkedHashMap<String,Object> insertMap, LinkedHashMap<String,String> typesMap)
      Creates a SQL Insert statement to be used for further execution.
      Parameters:
      insertMap - Helps creating the VALUE clause, see makeSelectValueClause(LinkedHashMap<String, Object>, LinkedHashMap<String, String>)
      typesMap - A map containing the data types with the field names as keys. See getTableTypes()
      Returns:
      A SQL Insert Statement string with the adequate format and ready to be filled.

    • executeInsert

      public void executeInsert(LinkedHashMap<String,Object> insertMap) throws SQLException
      Executes a SQL Insert Statement into the predefined table.
      Parameters:
      insertMap - A map containing all the data to be inserted, with the field names as keys.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If the statement is not able to be executed.

    • makeWhereClause

      private String makeWhereClause(LinkedHashMap<String,Object> selectMap) throws SQLException, GZDBResultException
      Creates a WHERE clause with defined conditions to look for in the table.
      Parameters:
      selectMap - A map containing all the values of each condition to be met and their respective fields to be applied on.
      Returns:
      A WHERE clause in a string format to be appended into a full SQL Select Statement.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If the method getTableFields() does not run correctly.
      GZDBResultException - If the field to be selected is not contained in the table.

    • getSelectStatement

      private String getSelectStatement(LinkedHashMap<String,Object> selectMap) throws SQLException, GZDBResultException
      Creates an SQL Select Statement to be used for further execution.
      Parameters:
      selectMap - A map containing all the values of each condition to be met and their respective fields to be applied on.
      Returns:
      A SQL Select Statement string with the adequate format and ready to be filled.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If the method getTableFields() does not run correctly. See makeWhereClause(LinkedHashMap).
      GZDBResultException - If the field to be selected is not contained in the table. See makeWhereClause(LinkedHashMap).

    • executeSelect

      public ArrayList<LinkedHashMap<String,Object>> executeSelect(LinkedHashMap<String,Object> selectMap) throws SQLException, GZDBResultException
      Executes a SQL Select Statement from the predefined table.
      Parameters:
      selectMap - A map containing all the values of each condition and their respective fields to be applied on.
      Returns:
      A list that provides different maps containing all the values returned by the SQL Select Statement.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If the statement is not able to be executed.
      GZDBResultException - If the method getSelectStatement(LinkedHashMap<String, Object>) does not run correctly.

    • getSelectAllStatement

      private String getSelectAllStatement() throws SQLException, GZDBResultException
      Creates an SQL Select Statement to be used for further execution.
      Returns:
      A SQL Select Statement string with the adequate format and ready to be filled.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If the method getTableFields() does not run correctly. See makeWhereClause(LinkedHashMap).
      GZDBResultException - If the field to be selected is not contained in the table. See makeWhereClause(LinkedHashMap).

    • executeSelectAll

      public ArrayList<LinkedHashMap<String,Object>> executeSelectAll() throws SQLException, GZDBResultException
      Executes a SQL Select Statement from the predefined table.
      Returns:
      A list that provides all the elements from the given table.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If the statement is not able to be executed.
      GZDBResultException - If the method getSelectStatement(LinkedHashMap<String, Object>) does not run correctly.

    • makeUpdateClause

      private String makeUpdateClause(LinkedHashMap<String,Object> updateMap) throws SQLException, GZDBResultException
      Creates a UPDATE clause with defined conditions to update the selected fields.
      Parameters:
      updateMap - A map containing all the values of the updated data and their respective fields to be updated on.
      Returns:
      A UPDATE clause in a string format to be appended into a full SQL Select Statement.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If the method getTableFields() does not run correctly.
      GZDBResultException - If the field to be updated is not contained in the table.

    • getUpdateStatement

      private String getUpdateStatement(LinkedHashMap<String,Object> updateMap, LinkedHashMap<String,Object> selectMap) throws SQLException, GZDBResultException
      Creates an SQL Update Statement to be used for further execution.
      Parameters:
      updateMap - A map containing all the values of each field to be updated and their respective fields to be applied on.
      selectMap - A map containing all the values of each condition to be met and their respective fields to be applied on.
      Returns:
      A SQL Update Statement string with the adequate format and ready to be filled.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If the method getTableFields() does not run correctly. See makeWhereClause(LinkedHashMap) and makeUpdateClause(LinkedHashMap<String, Object>).
      GZDBResultException - If the field to be updated is not contained in the table. See makeWhereClause(LinkedHashMap) and makeUpdateClause(LinkedHashMap<String, Object>).

    • executeUpdate

      public void executeUpdate(LinkedHashMap<String,Object> updateMap, LinkedHashMap<String,Object> selectMap) throws SQLException, GZDBResultException
      Executes a SQL Update Statement from the predefined table.
      Parameters:
      updateMap - A map containing all the values of each field to be updated and their respective fields to be applied on.
      selectMap - A map containing all the values of each condition and their respective fields to be applied on.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If the statement is not able to be executed.
      GZDBResultException - If the method getUpdateStatement(LinkedHashMap<String, Object>, LinkedHashMap<String, Object>) does not run correctly.

    • getDeleteStatement

      private String getDeleteStatement(LinkedHashMap<String,Object> deleteMap) throws SQLException, GZDBResultException
      Creates an SQL Delete Statement to be used for further execution.
      Parameters:
      deleteMap - A map containing all the values of each condition and their respective fields to be considered for applying a deletion.
      Returns:
      A SQL Delete Statement string with the adequate format and ready to be filled.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If the method getTableFields() does not run correctly. See makeWhereClause(LinkedHashMap) and makeUpdateClause(LinkedHashMap<String, Object>).
      GZDBResultException - If the field to be updated is not contained in the table. See makeWhereClause(LinkedHashMap) and makeUpdateClause(LinkedHashMap<String, Object>).

    • executeDelete

      public void executeDelete(LinkedHashMap<String,Object> deleteMap) throws SQLException, GZDBResultException
      Executes a SQL Delete Statement from the predefined table.
      Parameters:
      deleteMap - A map containing all the values of each condition and their respective fields to be considered for applying a deletion.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If the statement is not able to be executed.
      GZDBResultException - If the method getDeleteStatement(LinkedHashMap<String, Object>) does not run correctly.
